data.eml:eml: A new species of the Oriental planthopper genus Tenguna Matsumura, 1910 (Hemiptera: Fulgoroidea: Dictyopharidae) from Xizang, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Song, Zhi-Shun, Liang, Ai-Ping (2007): A new species of the Oriental planthopper genus Tenguna Matsumura, 1910 (Hemiptera: Fulgoroidea: Dictyopharidae) from Xizang, China. Zootaxa 1439: 57-64, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.175944
